about.ans: I am Devesh a senior, majoring in Computer Science from NIT, Jalandhar.
I am passionate about programming. A Fullstack developer inclined towards backend. You may have guessed it from my website's SSL public key behind.
I am proficient in Javascript, Typescript, Python & Java ( Learning) and related technologies like Node.js, React, Fast API, GraphQL , AWS, etc.

about.ques: What do I do in my free time?
about.ans: I love watching Anime (200+), playing basketball & contributing to Open Source in my free time.
Learning new things everyday and keep learning and utilize it to solve problems and leave an impact.

work.title: Software Engineer Intern
about: Implemented OIDC Auth Server, using Java, Node.js, Express, and Keycloak for enhanced security and scalability.
Transitioned from monolith to microservices, resulting in 30% faster response times.
reducing authentication latency by 20% using CDN caching and pre token generation.
Enhanced user authentication and authorization, achieving reduction in security incidents.

work.title: Frontend Engineer Intern
about: Developed responsive web interfaces with React, improving page load time by 25% and user engagement by 30%.
Integrated Firebase for real-time data synchronization, reducing API response times by 40%.
Collaborated with a cross-functional team to deliver three client projects ahead of schedule.
Conducted code reviews, optimizing codebase for maintainability and achieving a 15% reduction in bugs.

projects.title: Trip Advisor ChatBOT
about: This Project was under top 10 for Mercor Chatbot Challenge
Created a travel assistant chatbot using OpenAI's ChatGPT-3.5-turbo model in Python, FastAPI & React
Optimized performance by caching responses, minimizing API calls for repetitive queries.
Integrated third-party services, such as geolocation and Hotel APIs, to provide real-time information.
Enhanced chatbot interactions by analyzing user input using natural language processing techniques.

projects.title: Bento Mobile App
about: Designed and developed a barber appointment managing app in React Native & Firebase.
Streamlined the user experience by implementing features such as dynamic queue calculation, estimated
waiting time, and user notification functionalities, resulting in a 40% reduction in booking time.
Implemented Cloud Trigger Functions and Cron JOBs for efficient scheduling and seamless automation

projects.title: Trabel Blog Web App
about: Developed MERN-based Travel Blog App enabling posting, editing, and commenting on personal blogs.
Implemented user authentication and authorization using Auth0, enhancing security and user experience.
waiting time, and user notification functionalities, resulting in a 40% reduction in booking time.
Enhanced app performance, reducing load times by code optimization and Deployed on AWS EC2 using Docker Containers.
